# About me

I'm a fullstack developer with over 7 years’ experience working as a software developer. I recognize myself as a self motivated and hard-working person, with high level of responsibility, I always try my best to complete any project with the highest quality. To further sharpen my skill set, I am continuously acquiring new technologies and seeking more challenging jobs. If you curiously about me please visit my personal site (opens new window)
